product_name: Granite Gear Escape AC Ki 60 Pack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Outfitted with Air Current suspension and tough Cordura fabric, this comfortable, lightweight pack boasts a clean design, easy-to-reach bottle holders and plenty of lash points for extra gear.
